name: LumiLife
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room light”
”Alexa, turn on fan”
”Alexa, turn off fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hi, Lumi Life is the Home automation Application, which enables lights, fans, tv all electrical items to operate via Mobile through Lumi Life IOS and Android APP. All Skills will get a replica on Alexa to use also
